column4: hello friends, I was seeing if anyone could help me , I've tried installing pinguy 11.04 on my PC from both a Live Boot (made with linux live) and a burnt cd - both times it does not let me past the first installation page (the page with 2 tickboxes asking if youd like to download updates and install 3rd party drivers for mp3 etc.)
<kovu> ive tried installing it directly from the first boot screen & by going into the live mode first and then trying.,
sorry about that, it's only ubuntu here
